text: What about you? How do you practice public speaking?
I completely understand that you prefer privacy more than public speaking, but this is a way to learn something new!
I believe that you have all the qualities for public speaking, but you lack the motivation to do so.
Maybe you can practice in between classes. I can listen to your speech if you want.
I just feel that youâ€™d be so good at it!
Sometimes we have to take a leap of faith and believe that going out of our comfort zone can be rewarding.
